forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning then becoming windy with rain developing this afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning then becoming windy with rain developing this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 63F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.
